def_cn: 恶作剧;淘气;使坏的念头
def_en: Mischief is playing harmless tricks on people or doing things you are not supposed to do. It can also refer to the desire to do this.

def_cn: 惹麻烦之事;引起问题的行为；损害;麻烦
def_en: Mischief is behaviour that is intended to cause trouble for people. It can also refer to the trouble that is caused.
